name: Dessauer - Until We Learn To Live In Freefall

attributes.trait_type: Until We Learn To Live In Freefall

metadata.description:
The second set of 10 sonic vignettes from my album "Old Friends New Cities" is a collaboration with Ukrainian movement artist, Rudo. The first time I saw Rudo dance online I was awestruck by his totally original style of movement â€“ it was flowing, angular and raw.

In late 2022, Rudo arrived in Berlin from Kiev, and we immediately began a series of collaborations.

What you're seeing is the first fruit of those collaborations. Set against a backdrop of Brutalist architecture, we captured Rudo moving improvisationally to the music of "Old Friends New Cities", and then curated the most impactful fragments into bite-sized infini-loops. There is no post production done beyond reversing Rudo's organic freestyle.

I hope you'll enjoy it,
-dessauer

lyrics.text:
Song: Until We Learn To Live In Freefall
Artist: Dessauer

Year: 2023
